articles.title: 2024-25 CBS Sports All-America teams: College basketball's best and most talented players - CBS Sports
articles.description: The CBS Sports experts select our annual college basketball All-America teams
articles.content: Auburn'sJohni Broome, Duke'sCooper Flagg and Florida'sWalter Clayton Jr. have been voted unanimous 2025 CBS Sports First Team All-Americans. Purdue'sBraden Smith and Texas Tech'sJT Toppin rounded out… [+9855 chars]
